text.header: I will be sending more business your way!
text.contact: - Don DeLuca, Deluca Enterprises, North York ON
text.text: The rebuilt IDeal Networks SignalTek NT Batteries work like a charm!!! Thank you for your quick turnover time.

text.header: My TimTam massager battery works great!
text.text: The battery works great! Thanks for everything! The Canadian customers are overcharged on replacement batteries!

My 10-year old digital camera batteries are as good as new! Communication was excellent; prompt turnaround time; I have tested the batteries, they are excellent. Thank you, I will use your service again.
